wikibase-setting-entitytermsview-showEnt: Shaw labels, aliases an descriptions in aw ma leids on page laid
wikibase-sitelinks-empty: No page is airtit tae this item.
wikibase-undo-samerev: Twa different revisions must be specified tae undae an eedit.
wikibase-undo-nocontent: Canna laid content o reveesion $2 o page $1
wikibase-summary-generated: Summary (will be appendit tae an automatically generatit summary):
wikibase-itemdisambiguation-search: Ye can [$1 sairch for the item].
wikibase-itemdisambiguation-invalid-lang: Sorry, the leid code ye have providit is unkent tae the seestem. Please uise a valid leid code lik "sco".
wikibase-mergeitems-intro: Gif ye merge twa eetems, aw labels, descreeptions, aliases, sitelinks n statements will be muived fae yin eetem til the ither.
wikibase-listdatatypes-intro: This is ae leet o aw datatypes available oan this instawation:
wikibase-api-target-is-incompatible: Attempt tae reguid tae aen entitie o ae different type.
wikibase-special-mergeitems-error-prefix: The eetems coudna be merged. The follaein mistak occurred:
wikibase-listdatatypes-wikibase-item-bod: Airt tae ither eetems at the waurk. Whan ae value is entert the waurks "Eetem" namespace oan Wikidata will be raket fer matchin eetems.
wikibase-listdatatypes-commonsmedia-body: Airt tae files stored at Wikimedia Commons. Whan ae value is entert, the "File" namespace oan Commons will be raked fer matchin files.
wikibase-listdatatypes-globe-coordinate-:
Literal data fer ae geographeecal poseetion gien aes ae lateetuid-langeetuid pair in gms or decimal degrees fer the gien stellair bodie. Defauts til "Earth" n then "WGS84". It eiks ae resolution n range.
* lateetuid – impleecit first pairt (float, dms, dm, dd) o the coordinate string, direction is either gien bi prefixed sign or bi postfixed N/S
* langeetuid – impleecit seicont pairt (float, dms, dm, dd) o the coordinate string, direction is either gien bi prefixed sign or bi postfixed E/W
* globe – expleecit (?) data value, gien aes stellair bodie that defauts til the Yird  "http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q2"
* precesion - numereec preceesion o the coordinate
wikibase-listdatatypes-quantity-body:
Literal data field fer aen amoont that relates til some kyn o weel-defined unit. The actual unit gaes in the data values that ar entered.
* amoont – impleecit pairt o the string (mappin o unit prefix is onclear)
* unit – impleecit pairt o the string that defauts til "1" (mappin til staundairdizin bodie is onclear)
* upperboond - amoont's upper boond
* lowerboond - amoont's lower boond
